There is a class org.eclipse.jdt.internal.corext.javadoc.JavaDocLocations. The 
exception happend when closing Eclipse. I don't see this when shutting down my 
target workspace.

Possible explanation:

JavadocLocations isn't referenced on startup. So I quess that either the 
bundle registry is out of sync (Kai, do you start the target workspace with --
Dosgi.checkConfiguration=true) or a build kicked in which deleted the file, so 
that it couldn't be loaded

Closing as works for me.
